articles.title: Parents: Take social distancing seriously and limit playdates, other activities, experts say - CNN
articles.description: Coronavirus fears have locked us in our homes with our kids and loved ones for good reason, experts say. Parents need to practice social distancing and limit their kids' playdates and other activities.

articles.title: Twitter could have caused a coronavirus panic in New York. It's not doing a lot about it - CNN
articles.description: Tweets falsely claiming that New York City was going into lockdown as a result of the coronavirus swirled around Twitter Thursday evening. A "citywide quarantine" was about to come into place, one user falsely claimed.

articles.title: School closures of 8 weeks or more may better mitigate coronavirus spread, CDC says - CNN
articles.description: Closing schools for eight weeks or more may have a greater impact on mitigating the spread of the novel coronavirus than two- to four-week closures, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has said.
